We'll introduce the [eight core packages that make up the Tidyverse](https://www.tidyverse.org/packages/#core-tidyverse) and use at least one function from each package while exploring a dataset on the migration of penguins. # #date_end: 2020-08-31T19:40:00 #all_day: no # publishDate: '2020-09-01' featured: yes # image: # caption: '[Antarctic Tour of the Tidyverse | R-Ladies Chicago](https://spcanelon.github.io/tour-of-the-tidyverse)' # focal_point: center # preview_only: no slides: '' projects: [] links: - icon: images icon_pack: fas name: slides url: https://slides.silviacanelon.com/tour-of-the-tidyverse - icon: play-circle icon_pack: fas name: video url: https://youtu.be/m_ZoMmAIx-o - icon: github icon_pack: fab name: materials url: https://github.com/spcanelon/tour-of-the-tidyverse#an-antarctic-tour-of-the-tidyverse --- ## Description Learn how to explore and manipulate data in R with packages from the Tidyverse. We'll introduce the [eight core packages that make up the Tidyverse](https://www.tidyverse.org/packages/#core-tidyverse) and use at least one function from each package while exploring a dataset on the migration of penguins.
